## [5.0.1] - 2020-08-03_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixed build failures caused by changes in `ModuleBuilder` module v1.7.0_x000D__x000A_ by changing `CopyDirectories` to `CopyPaths` - Fixes [Issue #237](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/237)._x000D__x000A_- Updated to use the common module _DscResource.Common_ - Fixes [Issue #234](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/234)._x000D__x000A_- Pin `Pester` module to 4.10.1 because Pester 5.0 is missing code_x000D__x000A_ coverage - Fixes [Issue #238](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/238)._x000D__x000A_- OpticalDiskDriveLetter:_x000D__x000A_ - Removed integration test that tests when a disk is not in the_x000D__x000A_ system as it is not a useful test, does not work correctly_x000D__x000A_ and is covered by unit tests - Fixes [Issue #240](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/240)._x000D__x000A_- StorageDsc_x000D__x000A_ - Automatically publish documentation to GitHub Wiki - Fixes [Issue #241](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/241)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Disk:_x000D__x000A_ - Fix bug when multiple partitions with the same drive letter are_x000D__x000A_ reported by the disk subsystem - Fixes [Issue #210](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/210).

## [5.0.1] - 2020-08-03_x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixed build failures caused by changes in `ModuleBuilder` module v1.7.0_x000D__x000A_ by changing `CopyDirectories` to `CopyPaths` - Fixes [Issue #237](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/237)._x000D__x000A_- Updated to use the common module _DscResource.Common_ - Fixes [Issue #234](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/234)._x000D__x000A_- Pin `Pester` module to 4.10.1 because Pester 5.0 is missing code_x000D__x000A_ coverage - Fixes [Issue #238](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/238)._x000D__x000A_- OpticalDiskDriveLetter:_x000D__x000A_ - Removed integration test that tests when a disk is not in the_x000D__x000A_ system as it is not a useful test, does not work correctly_x000D__x000A_ and is covered by unit tests - Fixes [Issue #240](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/240)._x000D__x000A_- StorageDsc_x000D__x000A_ - Automatically publish documentation to GitHub Wiki - Fixes [Issue #241](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/241)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Disk:_x000D__x000A_ - Fix bug when multiple partitions with the same drive letter are_x000D__x000A_ reported by the disk subsystem - Fixes [Issue #210](https://github.com/dsccommunity/StorageDsc/issues/210).
